alert.note: Alert for Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 8:35PM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wolf River at New London affecting Winnebago, Outagamie and Waupaca Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Upper Wolf River near Shawano affecting Shawano County. Wolf River near Shiocton affecting Shawano, Outagamie and Waupaca Counties. Embarrass River near Embarrass affecting Shawano and Waupaca Counties. For the Lower Wolf River...including Shiocton, New London...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Embarrass River near Embarrass. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, There is widespread flooding of lowland and agricultural land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
